name: Jake Martinez
interest: Junior PM at early-stage startup learning to write effective product requirements

jobs.description: Managing mobile app features for B2C platform with 50K users

projects.title: User Onboarding Redesign
projects.description: User story: As a new user, I want a guided onboarding experience so that I can understand the app's value within 2 minutes

insights.description: Learning to balance user needs with technical constraints
Shipped first feature that increased user activation by 15%

jobs.description: Analyzed market trends and created client presentations

insights.description: Functional requirement example: App shall allow users to complete signup within 30 seconds
Acceptance criteria: Given a new user, when they tap 'Sign Up', then they see email/password form with clear error messages
